prompt:
Authorities foiled a terrorism plot targeting the national capital's subway system during rush hour.
The FBI arrested three suspects involved in an elaborate terrorism plot to poison the water supply.
Intelligence agencies uncovered a terrorism plot hatched by extremists to hijack commercial flights.
A sleeper cell was dismantled before executing their terrorism plot against government buildings.
The trial revealed details of a cross-border terrorism plot involving smuggled explosives.
Counterterrorism units raided a hideout linked to a terrorism plot aiming at crowded sports events.
An informant exposed a terrorism plot to launch drone attacks on military installations.
The investigation traced the terrorism plot back to online radicalization networks.
Border patrols intercepted vehicles carrying materials for a suspected terrorism plot.
The president addressed the nation after a terrorism plot was thwarted at a major airport.
